name: RWBY Fighters Alpha
description:
I make mugen for fun ;)

This game is in ALPHA VERSION. I publish it so you can play it and provide feedback on what you would like. It's free. 

WIP: 

  • Resize stages for accept double jump combos. 
  • Music (add a new son in select screen & reorder Weiss Song)
  • New Select screen . 

Now it's just a joke but I want release more versions and improve it with your support. 

Now with a Discord server for the feedback and the last news from this project. https://discord.gg/PnM2hUU COME AND TALK

You can play it online using Parsec: https://parsecgaming.com

Special Thanks to OHMSBY and  k6666orochi  for the characters.

Special Thanks to Dark_Sauce for the stages. 

Special Thanks to Wodash for the life bars. 

And also, thanks for the RWBY creators for all the hours of entertainment.
